alert.note: Alert for Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 06 at 4:57AM EST until January 07 at 10:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Up to 1 1/2 ft of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Southwest Suffolk and Southern Nassau Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 AM EST Sunday. * COASTAL FLOOD IMPACTS...Widespread minor flooding is expected in the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Expect up to 1 1/2 ft of inundation above ground level in low lying, vulnerable areas. Some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks, lawns and homes/businesses with basements near the waterfront will experience shallow flooding. * SHORELINE IMPACTS...Breaking surf of 4 to 7 ft on an east to west sweep will cause ocean beach escarpment. Localized dune erosion is likely during the Wednesday high tides, and overwashes are not expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Potential exists for widespread moderate to locally major coastal flooding with the Wednesday AM high tide next week in response to a strong storm system affecting the region late Tuesday into Wednesday. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. GREAT SOUTH BAY AT LINDENHURST NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.1 FT, MODERATE 3.6 FT, MAJOR 4.1 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 2.0 FT, MAJOR 2.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 06/05 AM 1.3/ 1.8 -0.3/ 0.2 0.2/ 0.7 1 NONE 07/06 AM 3.0/ 3.5 1.4/ 1.9 1.8/ 2.2 2 MINOR 07/06 PM 2.1/ 2.6 0.5/ 1.0 1.2/ 1.7 1 NONE 08/07 AM 2.1/ 2.6 0.5/ 1.0 0.8/ 1.3 1 NONE 08/07 PM 1.7/ 2.2 0.1/ 0.6 0.7/ 1.1 1 NONE GREAT SOUTH BAY AT WEST SAYVILLE NY MLLW CATEGORIES - info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
